## OpenSSF Best Practices Badge

**Open Source Security Foundation (OpenSSF) Best Practices Badge.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/coreinfrastructure/best-practices-badge)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://www.bestpractices.dev)
![ref-need-register]

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `id` | `string` | `true` |  | Project ID |  |

</details>

```txt
https://www.bestpractices.dev/projects/{id}/badge
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- best-practices-badge -->
![OpenSSF Best Practices](https://www.bestpractices.dev/projects/7652/badge)
```
